settings.heading: A BEAUTIFUL YOU, INSIDE AND OUT
settings.title: Acne Scarring
settings.body: One of the most challenging skin concerns to deal with is acne scarring. It can make you self-conscious socially and professionally and really impact emotional well-being. Balanced Aesthetics Medspa has treatments to diminish acne scars, so you don’t have to live with them.

settings.text: With the options available at Balanced Aesthetics to treat acne and the resulting scars, there’s likely a treatment that will work for your skin’s condition and sensitivity. Learn more with one of our experienced medical aestheticians during a comprehensive consultation.

Many of these treatments work best in a series, so your treatment plan will have a unique timeline for results. In some cases, like RF Microneedling, Laser Genesis, and IPL Therapy, you may notice improvement after the first session. Results will accumulate over the course of the series, so your progress may be quite dramatic once your treatment plan is concluded. For chemical peels, treatments can be gentle or aggressive, affecting how quickly you see improvement to your acne scars. The more aggressive you go, the faster your results.

settings.question: RADIOFREQUENCY (RF) MICRONEEDLING
settings.answer: Our advanced RF microneedling device, the Secret™ Pro by Cutera, combines two machines in one—the Secret™ RF and Fraxis Pro. The “smooth motor” tip safely creates micro-injuries that prompt your skin’s healing response to repair and replace scarred skin cells. The bipolar RF energy heats tissues to tighten skin and stimulate collagen production for healthier skin from the inside out.

settings.question: INTENSE PULSED LIGHT (IPL) THERAPY
settings.answer: Therapeutic broad-spectrum light wavelengths penetrate the skin’s surface to repair cells damaged by acne and scars. The energy is converted to heat to repair visible blood vessels and increase circulation while clearing up existing acne and acne-causing bacteria. The light reduces skin redness and regenerates collagen to diminish the look of acne scars.

settings.question: LASER GENESIS
settings.answer: Laser Genesis also stimulates collagen remodeling and reduces facial redness in microvessels. Together, these minimize the appearance of acnescars while promoting healing of the scar tissues themselves. A series of treatments can produce quite a dramatic improvement.

settings.question: CO2 SKIN RESURFACING
settings.answer: By creating minor, controlled injuries in the skin, CO2laser resurfacing initiates the healing of acne scar tissue. It’s an ablative method of skin rejuvenation where part of the skin’s surface is minimally damaged to heal the tissues. Only a fraction of the skin is affected, with healthy surrounding tissue creating bridges around the injuries for faster healing and less downtime.

settings.question: CHEMICAL PEELS
settings.answer: The customizable nature of chemical peels makes this treatment possible for most patients, even those with sensitive skin. The acid formula in your choice of peel removes the top layer of skin, including some of your acne scar tissue, and as the treatment area heals, those scarred cells are replaced with new, healthy cells. We offer various peel options, including mild strengths for patients with sensitive skin or those who desire little downtime. They can even be completed on your lunch break!

settings.title: What Treatments Are Available for Acne Scarring?

settings.text: At Balanced Aesthetics, there is no “cookie-cutter” approach to acne scar treatment. Your skin is unique to you, with its own best response and healing times. We can promise to bring the best our treatments offer to provide you real, measurable results in diminishing or even vanishing your acne scars.

settings.heading: SKILLED, CARING PROFESSIONALS

settings.body: For only $100 per month, start your membership today and begin enjoying all of the benefits of becoming part of the BAMFAM! Receive monthly, complimentary BAM Signature Facial treatments, discounts on retail products, and more.
